short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy URL or HTML source of page by a click/pressing keys.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables you to immediately copy the URL or the HTML source of the web page you are browsing by clicking the extension favicon and/or pressing the shortcut key (default: Ctrl + X for URL, Ctrl + Shift + X for source).
